rundroidrun.text: @installdroidrun.sh  and then push it to github then access termux via adb cli and do a git pull and run the updated script dont stop until droidrun is installed via this script  critical: the installation must be done through this script for fututr automation purpose. in case of error explain it to me wait for my suggestion for fix then make the fix in code in cursor and repeat the process

gitcommit.text: Make a git add and commit with relevent message

!!installintermux.text: cd /e/Code/LunarLand/MiniLinux/droidrunBuild && adb shell "run-as com.termux /data/data/com.termux/files/usr/bin/bash -c 'export PATH=/data/data/com.termux/files/usr/bin:/data/data/com.termux/files/usr/bin/applets:\$PATH && export PREFIX=/data/data/com.termux/files/usr && cd /data/data/com.termux/files/home/droidrundepedency && /data/data/com.termux/files/usr/bin/bash installdroidrun.sh'"

!!installdroidrun.text: cd /e/Code/LunarLand/MiniLinux/droidrunBuild && adb shell "run-as com.termux /data/data/com.termux/files/usr/bin/bash -c 'export PATH=/data/data/com.termux/files/usr/bin:/data/data/com.termux/files/usr/bin/applets:\$PATH && export PREFIX=/data/data/com.termux/files/usr && cd /data/data/com.termux/files/home/droidrundepedency && /data/data/com.termux/files/usr/bin/bash installdroidrun.sh'"

!gp.text: git add . && git commit "some commit message " && git push

!gr.text: git restore . && git pull && chmod +x installdroidrun.sh

!sshtermux.text: i have established ssh in the termux terminal use the command  ssh -p 8022 username@127.0.0.1  # connect to Termux via SSH

!!showlogs.text: avoid useless params like tail and head and 2>&1 as it stops the live terminal terminal from the user view make sure i see all logs in ther terminal in whihc script is running

!!connectssh.text:
# Short AI Prompt for Termux SSH Setup

## Copy-Paste This Prompt

```
Help me set up SSH in Termux and connect via ADB.

Requirements:
1. Use ADB to execute commands in Termux (package: com.termux)
2. Detect username: adb shell "run-as com.termux whoami"
3. Install openssh in Termux via ADB
4. Set password (use: trex)
5. Start SSH server on port 8022
6. Setup ADB port forwarding: adb forward tcp:8022 tcp:8022
7. Connect via SSH from computer

Termux context:
- Home: /data/data/com.termux/files/home
- Prefix: /data/data/com.termux/files/usr/bin
- Execute via: run-as com.termux sh -c 'export PATH=/data/data/com.termux/files/usr/bin:$PATH && [command]'

Provide:
- Automated bash script
- Manual step-by-step commands
- Quick connect script for future use

All commands should be copy-paste ready.
```

---

## Even Shorter Version

```
Create script to SSH into Termux via ADB:
1. Detect username: adb shell "run-as com.termux whoami"
2. Install openssh in Termux via ADB
3. Set password: trex
4. Start SSH server (port 8022)
5. Port forward: adb forward tcp:8022 tcp:8022
6. Connect: ssh -p 8022 [username]@127.0.0.1

Termux execute: run-as com.termux sh -c 'export PATH=/data/data/com.termux/files/usr/bin:$PATH && [cmd]'

Provide bash script + manual commands.
```

!!runastermux.text: adb shell "run-as com.termux sh -c 'cd /data/data/com.termux/files/home && export PATH=/data/data/com.termux/files/usr/bin:\$PATH && export HOME=/data/data/com.termux/files/home && export PREFIX=/data/data/com.termux/files/usr && exec sh'"

!!runintermux.text:
run-as com.termux 
cd /data/data/com.termux/files/home 
export PATH=/data/data/com.termux/files/usr/bin:\$PATH
export HOME=/data/data/com.termux/files/home
export PREFIX=/data/data/com.termux/files/usr

!!askme.text: before implementing and writing code ask me any questions or doubt you have related to this implementation.

!!cleancode.text: remove unused code extra code and make this code more maintainable and remove duplication of code make this code more clean
